_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:31:09 using v2.0
title: Are GPs open at times that are convenient and are patients satisfied with this?
analysis_commentary:
The percentage of patients who said that the opening hours of their surgery were convenient for them was 77% in 2012/13 and 80% of patients were satisfied with their GP surgery opening hours.

Although it seems that more could be done to improve these results, both these values have remained relatively unchanged compared to preceding years. This suggests either: that there have been no changes in primary care service provisions to meet the needs of the patients and/or there has been an increase in patientsâ€™ expectations which has masked improvements in this area.
